name: Spectron
description: Spectron is a fascinating oscilloscope-themed robot that is a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its classic box design and vibrant red and black screen, Spectron stands out among its fellow robots. Equipped with soldier-grade arms and legs, it possesses both strength and dexterity. The cat buttons on its body not only add a touch of charm but also serve as functional controls. Spectron's ability to analyze and display electrical waveforms makes it an indispensable companion for any electronic enthusiast. Its sleek appearance and advanced features are sure to impress both humans and robots alike.
